info.name: MultiDark pools: yiimp, zpool and more!
info.description:
When you're mining cryptocurrency in the dark, your eyes are accustomed to it, so opening bright sites makes you blind. This little style helps your eyes be healthy while visiting many pools.
Supported sites:
- yiimp.eu
- antminepool.com
- pool.coin-miners.info
- crc.cryptopros.us
- futurecoins.club
- pool.hashrefinery.com
- pool.nosekefik.com
- zpool.ca
- mpool.mooo.com
- arcpool.com
- bsod.pw
- pool.minertopia.org
- umine.org
- miningpool.shop
- phi-phi-pool.net
- cryptopool.xyz
- datapaw.net
- erstweal.com
- strakspool.com
- pickaxe.pro
- unimining.net
- ahashpool.com
- l8nit3-miners.com
- cryptonova.eu
- gos.cx
- zergpool.com
- rushhourmining.com
- quantumminingpool.com
- phi-phi-pool.com
- hive.gulfcoastmining.com
- hashfaster.com
- coin-miner.top
- bitcoin-pool.de
- epicpool.net
- fairmine.pro
- blockmuncher.com
- minemoney.co

Changelog:
*3.0 - 13/08/18 - minor fix with displaying current hashrate
*2.0 - 22/04/18 - cleanup a bit css, darked bright borders, fixed few things to make theme more versatile among multiple pools, removed datapaw.net (it redirects to new titan-mining.net with great dark theme), added gos.cx, zergpool.com, rushhourmining.com, quantumminingpool.com, phi-phi-pool.com, hive.gulfcoastmining.com, hashfaster.com, coin-miner.top, bitcoin-pool.de, epicpool.net, fairmine.pro, blockmuncher.com, minemoney.co
*1.6 - 31/03/18 - added ahashpool.com, l8nit3-miners.com and cryptonova.eu
*1.51 - 12/03/18 - removed altminer.net - pool down
*1.5 - 8/03/18 - added pickaxe.rpo and unimining.net
*1.4 - 27/01/18 - Fixed minor bugs, added datapaw.net, erstweal.com and strakspool.com
*1.3 - 1/01/18 - Happy New Year! Fixed selected algo in table. Added - miningpool.shop, phi-phi-pool.net and cryptopool.xyz
*1.2 - 30/12/17 - Added umine.org and pool.minertopia.org
*1.1 - 29/12/17 - Added arcpool.com and bsod.pw
*1.0 - 23/12/17 - Initial release

Known bugs:
- you tell me.
